title: Initialize workspace and copy templates
acceptance: workspace模板文件齐全（含 error sinks: QUALITY_GATE/RUN_ERRORS）

title: Draft kickoff questions + seed queries
acceptance: DECISIONS含C0问题块；queries.md 已基于 GOAL seed（本 pipeline 可不使用）

title: Define tutorial audience and learning objectives
acceptance: 包含受众/先修/学习目标/边界

title: Build concept graph and module breakdown
acceptance: 至少10个概念节点且标注依赖关系

title: Plan modules from concept graph
acceptance: 每模块有 objectives + outputs，并标注 running example 步骤（如适用）

title: Add verifiable exercises to each module
acceptance: 每模块≥1个练习：prompt/expected output/verification checklist

title: Human approve running example and scope
acceptance: 勾选 DECISIONS.md 的 Approve C2（并记录 running example）

title: Write tutorial modules (PROSE allowed after approval)
acceptance: 仅写被批准模块；每模块含练习与答案要点

title: Contract audit (artifact contract + target_artifacts)
acceptance: CONTRACT_REPORT.md 状态为 PASS（且无 DONE 输出缺失；target_artifacts 缺失=0）
